markdownRemark.html:
Word-Guess-Game

Overview

Word-Guess-Game is hangman-styled game where the user tries to guess a word based on a theme of general subjects. This version of Word-Guess-Game uses a single theme: Planets. The game runs in the browser, and is built using Bootstrap, Css, and Javascript.

Play it! here

Look the code here
